chn: det. & pron. 几个, 一些
example_en: She has read several books this month.
example_cn: 她这个月已经读了几本书。
memory_tips: 词源：来自拉丁语 'separalis'，意为“分开的”。联想记忆：可以将 'several' 与 'seven' 联想，虽然意思不同，但可以帮助记忆拼写。图像记忆：想象一个手指数数的场景，手指分开表示“几个”。

image_prompt.main_image: A hand showing three fingers, symbolizing 'several' items.
image_prompt.example_image: A girl sitting in a cozy chair surrounded by a stack of books, reading one with a smile.
